item.title: Report E-2023100362
item.description:
Report E-2023100362

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: HELENA
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal NMP experienced a customer location release of UN3098 Wheycide from a 55-gallon poly drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 50-gallons of product released to a 6' x 1' area of the trailer floor, and a 7' x 6' area of the concrete lot below due to a forklift puncture. Acid gator was deployed onto the impacted areas. The material remaining in the damaged drum was neutralized and solidified. The damaged empty drum was then containerized into a cubic yard box. All impacted absorbents were then collected into (2) 55-gallon vented poly drums. The waste was then transported to the XPO terminal located in Memphis, TN, and staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023070476
